articles.description: Indian Super League (ISL) outfit Kerala Blasters FC narrowly went down 4-3 in a seven-goal thriller against Gokulam Kerala FC in their opening fixture of the Durand Cup 2023 at the Mohun Bagan Ground in Kolkata on Sunday.

articles.title: India move up to number 3 in FIH rankings after winning record 4th Asian Champions Trophy - India Today
articles.description: The Indian hockey team has soared to third place in the latest FIH rankings following their record fourth triumph in the Asian Champions Trophy. India edged Malaysia 4-3 to lift the ACT title in Chennai.

articles.description: Shillong Lajong FC beat Downtown Heroes, Srinagar 2-1 to end their campaign on a high in a Group D fixture of the 132nd IndianOil Durand Cup.
